column5: Figure a we must have a few big hungry guys on this board  We have been purchasing frozen burgers and Dogs thru a family members co-worker, in effort to cut out the middle men Do any of you guys know of a public wholesaler anywhere in the GTA or surounding area?  Aside from costco  Thanks
Sysco.  They sometimes have minimums. Not sure how much volume you are talking about. Also not sure if they do cash & carry.
Salways is a good place hot dogs, sausages, buns condiments etc. It's where the street guys get theirs. By the box or lb.  Locate on Alness (Dufferin and Steels area.

Maybe check out the nearest National Grocers Cash & Carry. They use to only sell to businesses with a vender’s permit but about a year or so ago they opened to the public. I use to get my smokes and variety store sundries there when I ran my gas station; they were as cheep as any other wholesale supplier.  Dan.
Kariba foods on Brimley north of Kingston rd in  Scarborough, I'm pretty sure they do public cash and carry. Call before you head there to make sure.
Wholesale Club - in Whitby  They are part of the Supercentre/Loblaws group. Decent pricing.....alot of local restaurants use them.  They have a website.
Yea that’s what National Grocers sell; they might be part of the loblaws group as well?  Dan.
